alert.note: Alert for Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 4:28PM CDT until June 14 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Dale County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 428 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a severe thunderstorm capable of producing damaging winds in excess of 60 mph. This storm was located 9 miles west of Abbeville, and moving southwest at 5 mph. Penny size hail may also accompany the damaging winds. * Locations impacted include... Ozark, Bells Crossroads, Skipperville, Echo, Roberts Crossroads, Mabson, Arguta, Snells Crossroads, Ewell, Barefield Crossroads, Beamon, Browns Crossroads, Dale County Lake, Goldberg Field, Clopton, Phillips Crossroads, Ward Bridge, Dykes Crossroads and Bertha.
info.instruction: Severe thunderstorms produce damaging winds, destructive hail, deadly lightning and very heavy rain. For your protection, move to an interior room on the lowest floor of your home or business. Heavy rains flood roads quickly so do not drive into areas where water covers the road.
